mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_COMMENT, CF.CONSULTING_REQUEST_COUNT, O.ORDER_COUNT, B.BOARD_COUNT, TUF.FILE_NUMBER, TUF.FILE_NAME, TUF.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, TUF.FILE_UUID FROM TBL_USER U LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_FILE TUF ON U.USER_NUMBER = TUF.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_NUMBER, COUNT(CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER) AS CONSULTING_REQUEST_COUNT FROM TBL_CONSULTING_REQUEST WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} GROUP BY USER_NUMBER ) CF ON U.USER_NUMBER = CF.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_NUMBER, COUNT(ORDER_NUMBER) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} GROUP BY USER_NUMBER ) O ON U.USER_NUMBER = O.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_NUMBER, COUNT(BOARD_NUMBER) AS BOARD_COUNT FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} GROUP BY USER_NUMBER ) B ON U.USER_NUMBER = B.USER_NUMBER WHERE U.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}

SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.USER_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(B.MEAL_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEAL_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.MEAL_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS MEAL_TIME, BF.FILE_NUMBER, BF.FILE_NAME, BF.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, BF.FILE_UUID, F.MEAL_TOTAL_KCAL FROM TBL_BOARD B LEFT JOIN TBL_BOARD_FILE BF ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = BF.BOARD_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NUMBER, SUM(FOOD_KCAL) AS MEAL_TOTAL_KCAL FROM TBL_FOOD GROUP BY BOARD_NUMBER ) F ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = F.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE B.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} ORDER BY MEAL_DATE, MEAL_TIME
